ygData.subject: RE: Ok I need advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, when I looted it there was no coin, but someone retorted to that by saying that in PoS, most of them do NOT drop coin :-( Thanks for the advice though :-)
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, when I looted it there was no coin, but someone
retorted to that by saying that in PoS, most of them do NOT drop coin :-(

Thanks for the advice though :-)

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong
[mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2000 12:02 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ok I need
advice...

From: "Rokenn Swiftsong"
<rokenn@...>

>From: "Cranfill, Wendy"
<Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'"
<eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ok I need advice...
>
> So my question is this...
what do I do? I know in the
>future I'm not looting a thing and that we
should have had more clear rules
>set up. Does this happen on other servers?
Has this happened to any of
>you?
>

On all big hunts I have been on there is a
designated looter in each group,
usually the group leader. This person is
responsible for looting the corpse
if the group gets the kill as soon as
feasible. If the group leader dies
before the battle ends then someone in the
group, usually at the direction
of the group leader, will loot and report.

One way to tell if a corpse has been ninja
looted is if it gives no coin.
As, to the best of my knowledge, mobs will
always drop some coin, except of
course newbie mobs.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
